php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_LABEL: Verification of the status of the VAT payer
php.LBL_PL_VAT_PAYER_DESC: Verifies whether the entity is registered as a VAT taxpayer on prior to sending the inquiry based on the tax identification number.
php.LBL_GUS_DESC: Service that provides data from the Central Register of Entities of Poland
php.LBL_VIES_DESC: Confirmation of the VAT number for EU countries. Makes it possible to check whether the contractor is subject to a zero VAT rate
